        Is this master the current-default for the Slave we're on?
        Returns:
        'Y' is we're the default, 'N' else

      • makeDefaultMaster

        Make this master the default for this slave's satellite-sync operations

      • unsetAsDefault

        public void unsetAsDefault()
        Make sure this master is NOT the default for satellite-sync NOTE: Preferred is to make someone else the default -but sometimes, you just don't want a default...

      • isDefaultMaster

        public boolean isDefaultMaster()
        Is this master the default for this slave's satellite-sync?
        Returns:
        true if this is the master satellite-sync will use in the absence of other info

      • getMasterOrgs

        public java.util.Set<IssMasterOrg> getMasterOrgs()
        Get Orgs this master has let us know about
        Returns:
        list of orgs Master has told us about

      • setMasterOrgs

        protected void setMasterOrgs(java.util.Set<IssMasterOrg> inOrgs)
        Set the orgs for this master - protected, we want callers to either add-to the list, or to give us a chance to do the Right Thing in terms of connecting the incoming orgs and this master. This API is used by Hibernate
        Parameters:
        inOrgs - orgs of the master that we know of

      • resetMasterOrgs

        public void resetMasterOrgs(java.util.Set<IssMasterOrg> inOrgs)
        Reset the orgs for this master to a new map
        Parameters:
        inOrgs - orgs of the master that we know of

      • getNumMasterOrgs

        public int getNumMasterOrgs()
        How many orgs did Master tell us about? (NOTE: we add this because you can't do ${current.orgs.size} in the JSPs :( )
        Returns:
        number of orgs from this master we know of

      • getNumMappedMasterOrgs

        public int getNumMappedMasterOrgs()
        How many master-orgs have been mapped?
        Returns:
        number of unique master-orgs that have non-null local orgs
